links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
maple: with(numtheory):for n from 1 to 50 do a := convert(n^n,base,10):b := add(10^(nops(a)- i)*a[i],i=1..nops(a)):printf(`%d,`,b); od:
prog: (PARI) { for (n=1, 200, x=n^n; r=0; while (x>0, d=x-10*(x\10); x\=10; r=r*10 + d); write("b062018.txt", n, " ", r) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 29 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 01 2001
extensions: More terms from Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com) and _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jun 01 2001
